name: Strawb (itch)
description:
The goal in the puzzle game STRAWB is to catch your friend by clever movement or destruction of blocks in various levels with increasing difficulty.

Explore and challenge your brain in 40 levels with unique mechanics including teleportation, block shifting and lasers.

Will you solve the puzzles and catch you friend by clever combination of all mechanics? Try it out!

More levels will be implemented with future updates.

Controls - Gamepad:

Controls - Keyboard:

Arrow Keys /
WASD Keys
Walking  & Ladder climbingSPACE + Arrow Keys /
SPACE + WASD Keys
Destroy block in target direction SHIFT Key
Collectable ability: Shift row of blocks in front of playerR Key
Quick level restart
ESCOpen pause menu

Music
